title: So are the servers being dicky or the Telstra/Bigpond network?
body:
Hey I've recently been getting a fair amount of lag spikes.

Most of this started about 2/3 months ago when I had to make the switch from the DOCSIS 2 to the DOCSIS 3 network with Telstra. I just want to know if the problem is them or Riot servers.
I am on cable and a wired connection, I have tested with wifi on the router disabled and no other machines connected as well as ensuring no other application was running and using the internet.

Thanks.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you do the following for me;

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the url to your ICSI netalyzr results.
